titles.title: HP353 With wonder Lord we see your works

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
With wonder, Lord, we see your works,
We see your glory there displayed,
Below, above, in all that is
In beauty made.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
With wonder, Lord, we see your works,
And childlike in our joy we sing
To praise you, bless you, Maker, Lord
Of everything.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The stars that fill the skies above,
The sun and moon which give our light,
Are your designing for our use
And our delight.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
We praise your works, yet we ourselves
Are works of wonder made by you,
Not far from you in all we are
And all we do.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
All you have made is ours to rule,
The birds and beasts at will to tame,
All things to order for the glory
Of your name.
